CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: I ds = ( W / 2L ) × μ × C i ( V gs - V th ) The OFET device using as-cast PCDTBT films without thermal annealing exhibits a hole mobility of 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s with an on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) of 4.44 × 10^3 .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| as-cast PCDTBT films |
| thermal annealing |
| OFET device |
| hole mobility |
| V gs |
| V th |

Explanation:

* "as-cast PCDTBT films" is a material name, where PCDTBT stands for Poly[N-9′-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole)]
* "thermal annealing" is a material processing technique, but it is often used to modify the properties of a material, so it can be considered a material name
* "OFET device" is a device name, but it uses a specific material (as-cast PCDTBT films), so it can be considered a material name
* "hole mobility" is a material property, so it can be considered a material name
* "V gs" and "V th" are voltages, but they are specific to the material (as-cast PCDTBT films) and device (OFET device), so they can be considered material names.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| as-cast PCDTBT films |

Explanation:

* "as-cast PCDTBT films" is the only clear material name in the paragraph.
* "thermal annealing" is a material processing technique, not a material name.
* "OFET device" is a device name, not a material name.
* "hole mobility" is a material property, not a material name.
* "V gs" and "V th" are voltages, not material names.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: I ds = ( W / 2L ) × μ × C i ( V gs - V th ) The OFET device using as-cast PCDTBT films without thermal annealing exhibits a hole mobility of 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s with an on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) of 4.44 × 10^3 .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobility |
| on / off current ratio |

Explanation:

* "hole mobility" is a property of the OFET device that describes how quickly holes can move through the device.
* "on / off current ratio" (also written as "I on / I off") is a property of the OFET device that describes the ratio of the current flowing through the device when it is on (I on) to the current flowing through the device when it is off (I off).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobility |

Explanation:

* "hole mobility" is a material property that describes how quickly holes can move through a material. It is a property of the organic semiconductor material used in the OFET device.
* "on / off current ratio" is not a material property, but rather a property of the device as a whole. It is a ratio of two current values and does not describe the properties of any particular material.
